cards.ability_text: <flavor>Operating from the Double Worlds, Talus and Tralus, Kath Scarlet’s gang of smugglers and pirates would never be described as reputable or dependable—even by other criminals.</flavor>

cards.name: •Palob Godalhi
cards.subtitle: Tethan Resister
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your firing arc at range 0–2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

cards.name: •Torkil Mux
cards.subtitle: Mercenary Miner
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc. If you do, that ship engages at initiative 0 instead of its normal initiative value this round.

cards.name: Spice Runner
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Though its cargo space is limited compared to other light freighters, the small, swift HWK-290 is a favorite choice of smugglers who specialize in discreetly transporting precious goods.</flavor>

cards.name: •Guri
cards.subtitle: Prince Xizor’s Bodyguard
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is at least 1 enemy ship at range 0–1, you may gain 1 focus token.</smallbody><return> <shipability><sabold>Microthrusters:</sabold> While you perform a barrel roll, you <bold>must</bold> use the <leftbank> or <rightbank> template instead of the <straight> template.</shipability>

cards.name: •Dalan Oberos
cards.subtitle: Elite Bounty Hunter
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 stress token to rotate your ship 90º.</smallbody><return> <shipability><sabold>Microthrusters:</sabold> While you perform a barrel roll, you <bold>must</bold> use the <leftbank> or <rightbank> template instead of the <straight> template.</shipability>

cards.name: •Prince Xizor
cards.subtitle: Black Sun Kingpin
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, another friendly ship at range 0–1 and in the attack arc may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> damage. If it does, cancel 1 matching result.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Microthrusters:</sabold> While you perform a barrel roll, you <bold>must</bold> use the <leftbank> or <rightbank> template instead of the <straight> template.</shipability>

cards.name: Black Sun Assassin
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Although assassinations can be handled with a shot in the dark or a dire substance added to a drink, a flaming shuttle tumbling from the sky sends a special kind of message.</flavor> <return> <shipability><sabold>Microthrusters:</sabold> While you perform a barrel roll, you <bold>must</bold> use the <leftbank> or <rightbank> template instead of the <straight> template.</shipability>

cards.name: Black Sun Enforcer
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Prince Xizor himself collaborated with MandalMotors to design the <untalic>StarViper</untalic>-class attack platform, one of the most formidable starfighters in the galaxy.</flavor> <return> <shipability><sabold>Microthrusters:</sabold> While you perform a barrel roll, you <bold>must</bold> use the <leftbank> or <rightbank> template instead of the <straight> template.</shipability>

cards.name: •Serissu
cards.subtitle: Flight Instructor
cards.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 0–1 defends, it may reroll 1 of its dice.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Genesis Red
cards.subtitle: Tansarii Point Crime Lord
cards.ability_text: After you acquire a lock, you must remove all of your focus and evade tokens. Then, gain the same number of focus and evade tokens that the locked ship has.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Dace Bonearm
cards.subtitle: Outer Rim Mercenary
cards.ability_text: After an enemy ship at range 0–3 receives at least 1 ion token, you may spend 3<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, that ship gains 2 additional ion tokens.

cards.name: •Laetin A’shera
cards.subtitle: Car’das Enforcer
cards.ability_text: After you defend or perform an attack, if the attack missed, gain 1 evade token.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Quinn Jast
cards.subtitle: Fortune Seeker
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> on 1 of your equipped upgrades. <return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Inaldra
cards.subtitle: Tansarii Point Boss
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to reroll any number of your dice.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade. </shipability>

cards.name: •Sunny Bounder
cards.subtitle: Incurable Optimist
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, after you roll or reroll your dice, if you have the same result on each of your dice, you may add 1 matching result.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: Tansarii Point Veteran
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The defeat of Black Sun ace Talonbane Cobra by Car’das smugglers turned the tide of the Battle of Tansarii Point Station. Survivors of the clash are respected throughout the sector.</flavor> <return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: Cartel Spacer
cards.ability_text: <flavor>MandalMotors’ M3-A “Scyk” Interceptor is purchased in large quantities by the Hutt Cartel and the Car’das smugglers due to its low cost and customizability.</flavor> <return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Talonbane Cobra
cards.subtitle: Scourge of Tansarii Point
cards.ability_text: While you defend at attack range 3 or perform an attack at attack range 1, roll 1 additional die.

cards.name: •Graz
cards.subtitle: The Hunter
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if you are behind the attacker, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>While you perform an attack, if you are behind the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

cards.name: •Viktor Hel
cards.subtitle: Storied Bounty Hunter
cards.ability_text: After you defend, if you did not roll exactly 2 defense dice, the attacker gains 1 stress token.

cards.name: •Captain Jostero
cards.subtitle: Aggressive Opportunist
cards.ability_text: After an enemy ship suffers damage, if it is not defending, you may perform a bonus attack against that ship.

cards.name: Black Sun Ace
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The Kihraxz assault fighter was developed specifically for the Black Sun crime syndicate, whose highly paid ace pilots demanded a nimble, powerful ship to match their skills.</flavor>

cards.name: Cartel Marauder
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The versatile Kihraxz was modeled after Incom’s popular X-wing starfighter, but an array of after-market modification kits ensure a wide variety of designs. </flavor>

cards.name: •IG-88A
cards.subtitle: Aggressive Automaton
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship with <calculate> on its action bar at range 1–3. If you do, transfer 1 of your calculate tokens to it. <return><shipability><sabold>Advanced Droid Brain:</sabold> After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.</shipability>

cards.name: •IG-88B
cards.subtitle: Brutal Battledroid
cards.ability_text: After you perform an attack that misses, you may perform a bonus <cannon> attack.<return><shipability><sabold>Advanced Droid Brain:</sabold> After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.</shipability>

cards.name: •IG-88C
cards.subtitle: Conniving Contraption
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <boost> action, you may perform an <evade> action.<return><shipability><sabold>Advanced Droid Brain:</sabold> After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.</shipability>

cards.name: •IG-88D
cards.subtitle: Deadly Device
cards.ability_text: While you execute a Segnor’s Loop (<leftsloop> or <rightsloop>) maneuver, you may use another template of the same speed instead: either the turn (<leftturn> or <rightturn>) of the same direction or the straight (<straight>) template.<return><shipability><sabold>Advanced Droid Brain:</sabold> After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.</shipability>

cards.name: •4-LOM
cards.subtitle: Reprogrammed Protocol Droid
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver, gain 1 calculate token.<return>At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0–1. If you do, transfer 1 of your stress tokens to that ship.

cards.name: •Zuckuss
cards.subtitle: Meditative Gand
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

cards.name: Gand Findsman
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The legendary Findsmen of Gand worship the enshrouding mists of their home planet, using signs, augurs, and mystical rituals to track their quarry.</flavor>

cards.name: •Captain Nym
cards.subtitle: Captain of the Lok Revenants
cards.ability_text: Before a friendly bomb or mine would detonate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to prevent it from detonating.<return> While you defend against an attack obstructed by a bomb or mine, roll 1 additional defense die.

cards.name: •Sol Sixxa
cards.subtitle: Cunning Commander
cards.ability_text: If you would drop a device using a [1<nonbreak><straight>] template, you may drop it using any other speed 1 template instead.

cards.name: Lok Revenant
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The Nubian Design Collective crafted the Scurrg H-6 Bomber with combat versatility in mind, arming it with powerful shields and a bristling array of destructive weaponry.</flavor>

cards.name: •Torani Kulda
cards.subtitle: Rodian Freelancer
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>After you perform an attack, each enemy ship in your <bullseye> suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage unless it removes 1 green token.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Dead to Rights:</sabold> While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.</shipability>

cards.name: •Dalan Oberos
cards.subtitle: Returned from the Grave
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 shielded ship in your <bullseye> and spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. cards.name: Cartel Executioner
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Many veteran pilots in the service of the Hutt kajidics and other criminal operations choose the M12-L Kimogila for its firepower and dreaded reputation alike.</flavor><return><shipability> <sabold>Dead to Rights:</sabold> While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.</shipability>

cards.name: •Bossk
cards.subtitle: Fearsome Hunter
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, after the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><crit> result to add 2<nonbreak><hit> results.

cards.name: •Moralo Eval
cards.subtitle: Criminal Mastermind
cards.ability_text: If you would flee, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of the edge of the play area that you fled from.

cards.name: •Latts Razzi
cards.subtitle: Martial Artist
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a ship at range 1 and spend a lock you have on that ship. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

cards.name: Trandoshan Slaver
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The spacious triple-decker design of the YV-666 makes it popular among bounty hunters and slavers, who often retrofit an entire deck for prisoner transport.</flavor>

cards.name: •Dengar
cards.subtitle: Vengeful Corellian
cards.ability_text: After you defend, if the attacker is in your <frontarc>, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a bonus attack against the attacker.

cards.subtitle: Graceful Aruzan

cards.name: •Tel Trevura
cards.subtitle: Escape Artist
cards.ability_text: If you would be destroyed, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, discard all of your damage cards, suffer 5<nonbreak><hit> damage, and place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of your player edge.

cards.name: Contracted Scout
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Built for long-distance reconnaissance and plotting new hyperspace routes, the lightly armed JumpMaster 5000 is often extensively retrofitted with custom upgrades.</flavor>

cards.name: •Ketsu Onyo
cards.subtitle: Black Sun Contractor

cards.name: •Asajj Ventress
cards.subtitle: Force of Her Own

cards.name: •Sabine Wren
cards.subtitle: Artistic Saboteur
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if the attacker is in your <turretarc> at range 0–2, you may add 1<nonbreak><focus> result to your dice results.

cards.name: Shadowport Hunter
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Crime syndicates augment the lethal skills of their loyal contractors with the best technology available, like the fast and formidable <untalic>Lancer</untalic>-class pursuit craft.</flavor>

cards.name: •Han Solo
cards.subtitle: The Corellian Kid
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, you may roll 1 additional die.

cards.name: •Lando Calrissian
cards.subtitle: Smooth-talking Gambler
cards.ability_text: After you roll dice, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to reroll all of your blank results.

cards.name: •L3-37
cards.subtitle: Droid Revolutionary
cards.ability_text: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank (<leftbank> and <rightbank>) maneuvers.

cards.name: •Lando Calrissian
cards.subtitle: Smooth-talking Gambler

cards.name: •Outer Rim Pioneer

cards.ability_text: <flavor>Sometimes, manufacturer’s warnings are made to be broken.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Rigged Energy Cells:</sabold> During the System Phase, if you are not docked, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. cards.name: Freighter Captain
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Many spacers make a living traveling the Outer Rim, where the difference between smuggler and legitimate merchant is often murky. On the outskirts of civilization, buyers are rarely so discerning to ask where merchandise came from, at least as long as the price is low enough.</flavor>

cards.name: •“Null”
cards.subtitle: Epsilon Ace
cards.ability_text: While you are not damaged, treat your initiative value as 7.

cards.ability_text: <flavor>Only pilots who have demonstrated both exceptional skill and unwavering dedication are rewarded with coveted positions in the First Order squadrons operating secretly against the New Republic during the Cold War.</flavor>

cards.ability_text: After you lose a shield, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. cards.name: Zeta Squadron Survivor
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Humiliated by their failure, the remaining pilots from Starkiller Base are eager to prove their worth in pursuit of the Resistance.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Heavy Weapon Turret:</sabold> You can rotate your <turretarc> indicator only to your <frontarc> or <reararc>. cards.name: •“Muse”

cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–1. If you do, that ship removes 1<nonbreak>stress token.

cards.name: •Lieutenant Tavson

cards.ability_text: After you suffer damage, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform an action.<return><shipability><sabold>Linked Battery:</sabold> While you perform a <cannon> attack, roll 1 additional die.</shipability>

cards.name: Zeta Squadron Pilot
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Unhampered by a cumbersome galactic bureaucracy, technologies originally researched by the Empire’s TIE Advanced program are now mass-produced on First Order starfighters. As a result, TIE/fo pilots enjoy higher survival rates than their predecessors in the Galactic Empire.</flavor>

cards.name: •Kylo Ren
cards.subtitle: Tormented Apprentice
cards.ability_text: After you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to assign the <smallcaps>I’ll Show You the Dark Side</smallcaps> condition to the attacker.<return><shipability><sabold>Autothrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <barrelroll> or red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: •“Backdraft”
cards.subtitle: Fiery Fanatic
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> primary attack, if the defender is in your <reararc>, roll 1 additional die.<return><shipability><sabold>Heavy Weapon Turret:</sabold> You can rotate your <turretarc> indicator only to your <frontarc> or <reararc>. cards.name: Sienar-Jaemus Engineer
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Developed by Sienar-Jaemus Fleet Systems as a successor to the vaunted TIE Defender, the TIE/vn Silencer incorporates bleeding-edge technologies developed at research facilities hidden in the Unknown Regions.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Autothrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <barrelroll> or red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: •Poe Dameron
cards.subtitle: Trigger-Happy Flyboy
cards.ability_text: After you perform an action, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a white action, treating it as red.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Major Stridan
cards.subtitle: Stentorian Commander
cards.ability_text: While you coordinate or resolve the effect of one of your upgrades, you may treat friendly ships at range 2–3 as being at range 0 or range 1.<return><shipability><sabold>Linked Battery:</sabold> While you perform a <cannon> attack, roll 1 additional die.</shipability>

cards.name: •Nien Nunb
cards.subtitle: Sarcastic Survivor
cards.ability_text: After you gain a stress token, if there is an enemy ship in your <frontarc> at range 0–1, you may remove that stress token.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Kare Kun
cards.subtitle: Woman of Action
cards.ability_text: While you boost, you may use the [1 <leftturn>] or [1 <rightturn>] template instead.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: Starkiller Base Pilot
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The <untalic>Upsilon</untalic>-class command shuttle serves as a base of operations for many of the First Order's senior officers and agents. Its powerful sensors and communications equipment allow them to orchestrate the spread of terror across the galaxy.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Linked Battery:</sabold> While you perform a <cannon> attack, roll 1 additional die.</shipability>

cards.name: •Jessika Pava
cards.subtitle: The Great Destroyer
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> or 1 non-recurring<nonbreak><standardcharge> from your equipped <astro> upgrade to reroll up to 1<nonbreak>of your dice for each other friendly ship at range 0–1.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Joph Seastriker
cards.subtitle: Reckless Bodyguard
cards.ability_text: After you lose 1 shield, gain 1<nonbreak>evade token.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: First Order Test Pilot
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Engineered for incredible speed and precise handling, the TIE Silencer is devastating in the hands of those who can unlock its full potential. Any lesser pilot could easily be overwhelmed and lose control of the nimble craft. </flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Autothrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <barrelroll> or red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: Blue Squadron Rookie
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The Incom-FreiTek T-70 X-Wing was designed to improve upon the tactical flexibility of the venerable T-65. The starfighter’s advanced droid socket is compatible with a wide array of astromechs, and its modular weapons pods allow ground crews to tailor its payload for specific missions.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Han Solo
cards.subtitle: Jaded Smuggler
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> You can be placed anywhere in the play area beyond range 3 of enemy ships.

cards.name: •Ello Asty
cards.subtitle: Born to Ill
cards.ability_text: After you reveal a red Tallon Roll [<lefttalon> or <righttalon>] maneuver, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, treat that maneuver as white.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Chewbacca
cards.subtitle: Loyal Companion
cards.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range 0–3 is destroyed, before that ship is removed, you may perform an action. Then you may perform a bonus attack.

cards.name: Resistance Sympathizer
cards.ability_text: <flavor>After witnessing the Hosnian Cataclysm, some spacers willingly aided the Resistance with whatever ships they had.</flavor>

cards.name: •Temmin Wexley
cards.subtitle: Snap
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 2–4 maneuver, you may perform a <boost> action.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Ben Teene
cards.subtitle: Crimson Bolide
cards.ability_text: After you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <turretarc>, assign the <smallcaps>Rattled</smallcaps> condition to the defender.

cards.name: •Cat
cards.subtitle: Cobalt Wasp
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is at range 0–1 of at least 1<nonbreak>friendly device, roll 1 additional die.

cards.name: Red Squadron Expert
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Although the bulk of the Resistance Starfighter Corps is made up of young volunteers from the New Republic, their ranks are bolstered by veterans of the Galactic Civil War determined to finish what they started decades ago.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1<nonbreak><cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a red maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your <bullseye>, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

cards.name: •Clone Commander Cody
cards.ability_text: After you perform an attack that missed, if 1<nonbreak>or more <hit>/<crit> results were neutralized, the defender gains 1<nonbreak>strain token.

cards.name: Seventh Fleet Gunner
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>While another friendly ship performs a primary attack, if the defender is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 <standardcharge>. If you do, the attacker rolls 1<nonbreak>additional die, to a maximum of 4. During the System Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 <standardcharge>.</smallbody>

cards.name: Synchronized Console
cards.ability_text: After you perform an attack, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1 or a friendly ship with the <smallcaps>Synchronized Console</smallcaps> upgrade at range 1–3 and spend a lock you have on the defender. If you do, the friendly ship you chose may acquire a lock on the defender.

cards.name: Grappling Struts (Closed)
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1 or fewer other friendly ships at range 0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

cards.name: •Chancellor Palpatine
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>After you defend, if the attacker is at range 0–2, you may spend 1 <forcecharge>. If you do, the attacker gains 1 stress token.<return>During the End Phase, you may flip this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: Passive Sensors
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. You can only perform this action in your Perform Action step.</smallbody><return><smallbody>While your<nonbreak><standardcharge> is inactive, you cannot be coordinated. Before you engage, if your <standardcharge> is inactive, you may perform a<nonbreak><calculate> or<nonbreak><targetlock> action.</smallbody>

cards.name: Autoblasters
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If the defender is in your <bullseye>, roll 1 additional die. During the Neutralize Results step, if you are not in the defender’s<nonbreak><frontarc>, <evade><nonbreak>results do not cancel <crit><nonbreak>results.

cards.name: •Diamond-Boron Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, each ship at range<nonbreak>0–1 of the defender with agility equal to or less than the defender's rolls 1<nonbreak>attack die and suffers 1<nonbreak><hit>/<crit> damage for each matching result.</smallbody>

cards.name: •Amilyn Holdo
cards.ability_text: Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–2. You may transfer to that ship 1 token of a type that ship does not have. That ship may transfer 1 token to you of a type you do not have.

cards.name: Plasma Torpedoes
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. During the Neutralize Results step, <crit><nonbreak>results are canceled before <hit><nonbreak>results. After this attack hits, the defender loses 1<nonbreak>shield.

cards.name: •Korr Sella
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, remove all of your stress tokens.

cards.name: •Larma D’Acy
cards.ability_text: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform<nonbreak><reinforce>, <coordinate>, and<nonbreak><jam> actions, even while stressed.<return>While you perform a white<nonbreak><reinforce>, <coordinate>, or <jam> action, if you are stressed, treat that action as red.

cards.name: •GA-97
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Before placing forces, you may spend 3–5<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, choose another friendly ship and assign the <smallcaps>It’s the Resistance</smallcaps> condition to it.

cards.name: •Kaydel Connix
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a basic maneuver of the next higher speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

cards.name: •Leia Organa
cards.ability_text: After a friendly ship reveals its dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, the chosen ship reduces the difficulty of that maneuver.

cards.name: •PZ-4CO
cards.ability_text: At the end of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1<nonbreak>friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–2.  If you do, transfer 1<nonbreak>calculate token to that ship.  If your revealed maneuver is blue, you may transfer 1 focus token instead.

cards.name: •R2-A6
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to a maneuver of the same bearing of a speed 1<nonbreak>higher or lower.

cards.name: •R2-C4
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak>evade token to change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a <hit><nonbreak>result.

cards.name: •Dash Rendar
cards.subtitle: Hotshot Mercenary
cards.ability_text: While you move, you ignore obstacles.<return><shipability><sabold>Sensor Blindspot:</sabold> While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0–1, do not apply the range 0–1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.</shipability>

cards.name: •TA-175
cards.ability_text: After a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 with<nonbreak><calculate> on its action bar is destroyed, each friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3 with<nonbreak><calculate> in its action bar gains 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

cards.name: •Electro-Proton Bomb
cards.ability_text: <bitalic>Bomb</bitalic><return><smallbody>During the System Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to drop an Electro-Proton Bomb with the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template. Then place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.</smallbody><return><smallbody>This card’s <standardcharge> cannot be recovered.</smallbody>

cards.name: Delayed Fuses
cards.ability_text: After you drop, launch, or place a bomb or mine, you may place 1<nonbreak>fuse marker on that device.

cards.name: Angled Deflectors
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Starfighter shields often have manual overrides that allow them to be angled for increased front or rear protection. However, doing so leaves the ship exposed if the pilot’s situational awareness falters.</flavor>

cards.name: Landing Struts (Closed)
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.<return>While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1<nonbreak>or fewer other friendly ships at range<nonbreak>0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

cards.name: Landing Struts (Open)
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>You ignore obstacles at range<nonbreak>0 and while you move through them. After you reveal your dial, if you reveal a maneuver other than a [2<nonbreak><straight>] and are at range<nonbreak>0 of an asteroid or debris cloud, skip your Execute Maneuver step and remove 1<nonbreak>stress token; if you revealed a right or left maneuver, rotate your ship 90° in that direction. After you execute a maneuver, flip this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: Ensnare
cards.ability_text: At the end of the Activation Phase, if you are tractored, you may choose 1<nonbreak>ship in your <turretarc><nonbreak>arc at range<nonbreak>0–1. Transfer 1<nonbreak>tractor token to it.

cards.name: Gravitic Deflection
cards.ability_text: While you defend, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die for each tractored ship in<nonbreak>the attack arc.

cards.name: Snap Shot
cards.ability_text: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.<return><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> Your dice cannot be modified.

cards.name: Foresight
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform this attack against it as a<nonbreak>bonus attack.</smallbody><return><smallbody><smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> You may change 1<nonbreak><focus> result to a<nonbreak><hit><nonbreak>result; your dice cannot be modified otherwise.</smallbody>

cards.name: Precognitive Reflexes
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a<nonbreak><barrelroll><nonbreak>or<nonbreak><boost><nonbreak>action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on<nonbreak>your action bar, gain 1<nonbreak>strain token.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

cards.name: •Ahsoka Tano
cards.ability_text: After you execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> and choose a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>1–3 in your firing arc. If you do, it may perform a red<nonbreak><focus><nonbreak>action, even while stressed.

cards.name: •C-3PO
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if you are calculating, you may reroll 1<nonbreak>defense die.<return>After you perform a <calculate> action, gain 1<nonbreak>calculate token.

cards.name: •C1-10P
cards.ability_text: <smallbody><smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Equip this side faceup.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you execute a maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a red<nonbreak><evade><nonbreak>action, even while stressed.</smallbody><return><smallbody>During the End Phase, if this card has 0<nonbreak> active <standardcharge>, flip it.</smallbody>

cards.name: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

cards.name: Targeting Computer
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Targeting computers are standard features on many vessels, especially those designed to deliver ordnance. Some light starfighters and transport craft lack such weapons guidance, though it can be installed as an after-market modification.</flavor>

cards.name: Ion Cannon Turret
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: •R1-J5
cards.ability_text: While you have 2<nonbreak>or fewer stress tokens, you can perform actions on damage cards even while stressed.<return>After you repair a damage card with the <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> trait, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair that card again.

cards.name: •Kaz’s <italic>Fireball</italic>
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> When you resolve <smallcaps>Explosion with Wings</smallcaps>, you may search the damage deck and choose a damage card with the <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> trait; you are dealt that card instead. Then, shuffle the damage deck.<return>You can perform actions on damage cards even while ionized.

cards.name: •K-2SO
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range<nonbreak>0–3.  That ship gains 1<nonbreak>calculate and 1<nonbreak>stress token.

cards.name: Stabilized S-foils (Open)
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>After you perform an attack, you may spend your lock on the defender to perform a bonus <cannon><nonbreak>attack against that ship using a <cannon><nonbreak>upgrade you have not attacked with this turn.</smallbody><return><smallbody>Before you activate, if you are not critically damaged, you may flip this card.</smallbody>

cards.name: Mag-Pulse Warheads
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1<nonbreak><crit> damage and gains 1<nonbreak>deplete and 1<nonbreak>jam token. Then cancel all <hit>/<crit><nonbreak>results.

cards.name: Coaxium Hyperfuel
cards.ability_text: You can perform the <slam> action even while stressed. If you do, you suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage unless you expose 1<nonbreak>of your damage cards.<return>After you partially execute a maneuver, you may expose 1<nonbreak>of your damage cards or suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage to perform a <SLAM> action.

cards.name: Stabilized S-foils (Closed)
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, if you are not critically damaged, you may flip this card.

cards.name: •C1-10P (Erratic)
cards.ability_text: After you execute a maneuver, you <bold>must</bold> choose a ship at range<nonbreak>0–1. It<nonbreak>gains 1<nonbreak>jam token.
